name: Parallel Calibration
description: Execute tasks in parallel across multiple qubits (task-first order)

name: Sequential Calibration
description: Execute all tasks sequentially for each qubit (qubit-first order)

name: Custom Parallel Flow
description: Execute qubit groups in parallel using schedule nodes (e.g., 32→33 and 36→38 in parallel)

name: Adaptive Calibration
description: Calibration with convergence detection and iteration limit

name: Iterative Parallel Flow
description: Repeat parallel group calibration N times (e.g., Group1 || Group2, repeated 3 times)
